author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biospecifics Technologies Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.54
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Biospecifics Technologies Corp:
* BIOSPECIFICS TECHNOLOGIES CORP. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $7.1 MILLION VERSUS $7.7 MILLION * BIOSPECIFICS - AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, CO HAD CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AND INVESTMENTS OF $64.2 MILLION, COMPARED TO $65.1 MILLION AS OF DEC 31, 2017
* BIOSPECIFICS - CO’S CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS WERE SLIGHTLY LOWER DUE TO THE TIMING OF ENDO’S PAYMENT OF ITS QTRLY XIAFLEX ROYALTIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
